attributes.action: Extend the Victoria line from Brixton to Gypsy Hill
attributes.additional_details: Put pressure on TFL to extend the Victoria line to Gypsy hill
attributes.background: Bus services between Upper Norwood & Brixton can take a long time due to bad traffic resulting in additional stress & lateness.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of Transport for London and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can petition TfL here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
